analysis_level.description: default <<all>>. Compute only sensor <<1>>. Compute only activation <<2>>. Compute only connectivity <<3>>. combination of them <<12>> OR <<23>>. and all of them <<all>>

run_by_trial.description: default <<false>>. The time series of different trials are analyzed independently <<true>> or they are combined in a single time serie <<false>>

run_frequency_bin.description: default <<false>>. Frequency components are analyzed independentlly <<true>> or according to a band structured sparsity model corresponding to smoothness in the spectral domain <<false>>

system_response.description: default <<false>>. Decide wheather the souces are responsive for all frequencies or not when applying sSSBL z-scores. <<false>> (apply z-scores indepoendentlly for all frequencies) <<true>> (apply z-scores jointly for all frequencies)

data_resolution.description: <<default>> selected cortex on Brainstorm protocol. <<5003>> if you desire to analyze the data with a specific cortical resolution. e.g <<6002>>.<<8002>>.<<10002>>
data_resolution.m_description: default value :<<OpenMEEG BEM>>. other values:<<Single sphere>>. <<Overlapping spheres>>

data.description: Preprocessed data params. You can not remove the <<SubID>> generic part

clean_data.description: Clean EEG channels with external Toolbox (Removing and interpolating channels)

select_events.by_description: Default:<<empty>>. Selection of the data by <<marks>> way or <<segments>> way
select_events.events_description: Type the events that you want to select from the data. If you want to extract all data leave the events list empty. For select a specific event fill the list like the events_example tab
